title: Single Player Project - DayZ AI Server Pack for LAN
description:
Another DayZ Server Pack for Offline/LAN play.


Included:

DayZ servers:
-------------
DayZ(1.7.7.1 - Official Hive)

DayZ servers with AI:
---------------------
Chernarus + DZAI (1.7.7.1 - Official Hive)
Chernarus + Sarge AI (1.7.7.1 - Official Hive)
Chernarus + DZAI (1.7.7.1 - Reality Private Hive)
Taviana for DayZ 1.7.7 + Sarge AI (Tact's Build) [under development]

Mod servers with AI:
--------------------
DayZ Epoch + DZAI (1.0.1.5)
DayZ Origins + DZAI (1.7.1)

Tools:
------
ArmA 2 keygen and key changer
Automatic key server block tool (for pirate mode)
Latest Arma 2 Beta patch

Mods included too.

Install:
--------
0. (Steam version only) Copy Arma 2 and OA in a folder
1. Copy all files into ArnA 2 Combined Operations folder
2. Run dayz_server to start a server
3. Run dayz_game.bat to start a mod

Issues:
-------
No vehicles on Chernarus + DZAI (1.7.7.1 - Reality Private Hive) and Taviana for DayZ 1.7.7 + Sarge AI (Tact's Build) [under development] servers. Later I fix this.
